name: Psalms Rosary
description: A rosary journey through beloved Psalms of praise and petition

cross.title: Call to Worship
cross.content: Come, let us sing to the Lord! Let us shout joyfully to the Rock of our salvation.

firstLargeBead.title: Psalm 23:1
firstLargeBead.content: The Lord is my shepherd; I shall not want.

threeSmallBeads.content: He makes me lie down in green pastures
He leads me beside still waters

secondLargeBead.title: Psalm 100:5
secondLargeBead.content: For the Lord is good; His steadfast love endures forever, and His faithfulness to all generations.

largeBead.title: Psalm 103:1
largeBead.content: Bless the Lord, O my soul, and all that is within me, bless His holy name!

refrain.content: Let everything that has breath praise the Lord!

largeBead.title: Psalm 91:1-2
largeBead.content: He who dwells in the shelter of the Most High will abide in the shadow of the Almighty. I will say to the Lord, 'My refuge and my fortress, my God, in whom I trust.'

refrain.content: In You, O Lord, I put my trust

largeBead.title: Psalm 118:1
largeBead.content: Give thanks to the Lord, for He is good; His love endures forever.

refrain.content: I will give thanks to the Lord with my whole heart

largeBead.title: Psalm 51:10
largeBead.content: Create in me a clean heart, O God, and renew a right spirit within me.

refrain.content: Have mercy on me, O God, according to Your steadfast love

largeBead.title: Psalm 19:1
largeBead.content: The heavens declare the glory of God, and the sky above proclaims His handiwork.

refrain.content: The whole earth is full of His glory
